name: Tibanna Floating Refinery
Lore: 'Refines Tibanna gas at mines like those at Cloud City. Also used for moisture collection on dry planets.',
Text: 'Deploy on a cloud sector. Your Force generation is +1 at cloud sectors you occupy. Once during your control phase, if you occupy this sector and a battleground site, may draw destiny. If destiny > 2, retrieve 1 Force. If lost from table, place this Device in Used Pile.',
